title: Ticket #758: EXCEPT if new param system default and old one disagree
description: if the old param system with a default is being used (param_boolean("ALLOW_VM_CRUFT", true)), check against the new param table, even if we're not using the result. If the setting is in the new param table, but the default there is different than what was passed in, EXCEPT. This should let us identify discrepancies more quickly.
